nodes.bodyText: Do we know why this is null? I.e. in what circumstances is it null? I thought category should never be null.
Some Charts like Pie or Gauge have only series. This chart generation is not prepared to support some kind of charts...

Could we do this?
List<NameableObject> categories = new ArrayList<>( ObjectUtils.firstNonNull( chart.category(), new ArrayList<>() ) );
Thanks Lars. I applied the same code I applied for other branches just to keep them in sync. It's pretty much the same in the end.
